pullRequest.body:
This is point (3) of https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/channel/287929-mathlib4/topic/Possible.20improvements.20to.20Lean.2FMathlib/near/499085779

Unfortunately this adds a relatively large import to the `push_neg` tactic.

Should the `push_neg` tactic become extensible with a `@[push_cast]` tag?
